title.ph: Working with Data in a Flow

concept.shortdesc: The real power of a flow is that it can automate updates to your data, whether the data lives inside your Salesforce org or in an external database. In a flow, you can look up values from records, connect to external systems, create records, update records, delete records—the whole shebang!
